title: Blended Language Learning Design Utilizing Multimedia

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with fundamental online learning tools
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment using digital devices aiming to enhance language proficiency. Learning outcomes measured through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can design language learning content utilizing multimedia elements (images, videos, audio)
Learners can apply content organization strategies that minimize cognitive load in blended learning environments
Learners can create weekly language learning modules using an LMS (Learning Management System) interface
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
